cards.heading: Custom Software Solutions

cards.description: Unlock the hidden potential in your data. We'll help you build data pipelines, create insightful dashboards, and make data-driven decisions.

cards.heading: Custom AI Solutions
cards.description: Develop custom AI models and applications tailored to your specific needs, giving your business a unique advantage in the market.

cards.heading: Enhanced Customer Experiences

cards.heading: Cloud Migration and Modernization
cards.description: Unlock scalability, flexibility, and cost savings by migrating to the cloud. We're Azure experts and can guide you through every step.

cards.heading: Secure and Reliable Infrastructure
cards.description: Ensure your applications are always available and secure with a well-designed infrastructure. We offer both cloud and on-premises solutions

blocks.heading: Why Partner with SSW?
blocks.body: Thinking about a new project? Wondering if we're the right fit? We get it. You need a team that can deliver. Here are some straight answers to your burning questions.

accordionItems.label: Let's cut to the chase. Why should I choose SSW over other dev shops?
accordionItems.content: We get it. You've got options. Here's the deal: We've been building software since the days of dial-up (over 30 years!). We've seen tech trends come and go, and we've learned a thing or two along the way. We're problem solvers who know how to build solutions that actually work and deliver real results. Plus, we're Microsoft Gold Partners, so we know our stuff when it comes to the .NET ecosystem and Azure.

accordionItems.label: Lots of companies claim to be "Agile." What makes you different?
accordionItems.content: We don't just throw the word "Agile" around. We live and breathe it. Short sprints, daily stand-ups, continuous feedback loops - it's all baked into our DNA. We're all about shipping early and often, getting your product in front of users fast, and iterating based on real-world feedback. No waterfall nightmares here. We're also big on Scrum, and our devs are certified Scrum Masters, so you are in good hands.

accordionItems.label: I've been burned by developers before. How do I know you'll deliver?
accordionItems.content: We understand the skepticism. We're all about transparency and communication. You'll have direct access to our developers, and we'll keep you in the loop every step of the way. Plus, our rigorous testing process and commitment to best practices ensure that we deliver high-quality, reliable software.

accordionItems.label: What's your approach to project management?
accordionItems.content: We keep it simple and efficient. No unnecessary bureaucracy or red tape. We use tools like GitHub and Azure DevOps to manage projects, track progress, and collaborate effectively. You'll have full visibility into what we're doing and how we're doing it.

blocks.heading: BizCover: From Microservice Maze to Monolith Magic
blocks.description: We Marie Kondo'd BizCover's codebase, swapping their microservice sprawl for a tidy modular monolith. Domain-driven design helped us define the modules, while OpenTelemetry, Prometheus, and Grafana kept things monitored.

features.heading: New devs onboarded 85% faster.
features.description: From 6 weeks to 5 days. Now that's what we call an improvement!

features.heading: Feature delivery speed? Boosted by 40%
features.description: They're shipping code like there's no tomorrow.

blocks.heading: Insights: Tech Wisdom from the Trenches
blocks.body: We've spent decades in the software trenches, battling legacy code, chasing down bugs, and wrestling with the latest tech. We've learned a few things along the way - often the hard way. SSW is all about sharing that hard-won wisdom. No fluff, no jargon, just straight talk to help you build better software.

cards.heading: Coding Naming Conventions: The Secret to Readable and Maintainable Code
cards.description: Is your code a mess of cryptic abbreviations and random capitalization? Learn the secrets of proper naming conventions (PascalCase, camelCase, snake_case, oh my!) and level up your code readability. Jeoffrey from SSW breaks it down in this video.

cards.heading: .NET 8: Why Your CTO is Probably Eyeing It (and You Should Too)
cards.description: CTOs have a tough job. They need to keep your company's tech stack from turning into a digital dinosaur while also making sure everything runs smoothly and securely. That's why .NET 8 is turning heads. It's not just another boring framework update; it's a legit upgrade for modern app development. Let's break down why.

cards.heading: Watch Matt Parker Build a Blazor Desktop App with Photino (Live!)
cards.description: Think you need Electron for desktop apps? Think again! Join Matt Parker as he explores Photino, a lightweight framework that lets you build cross-platform desktop apps with Blazor. Watch him build a real app live and learn how to get started.

blocks.heading: Ready to Transform Your Tech? Let's Talk.
blocks.description: Let's discuss your project and see how we can help you achieve your goals.
